abstract: Islamic State claims responsibility for terrorist attack that killed 10 people in Karak, Jordan; Saad Maaytah, head of military’s special forces, is among victims.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The assault in the southern city of Karak killed 10 people, including the head of the military’s special forces, two civilians and a Canadian tourist.
snippet: The assault in the southern city of Karak killed 10 people, including the head of the military’s special forces, two civilians and a Canadian tourist....

headline.main: ISIS Is Said to Claim Responsibility for Deadly Attack in Jordan
headline.print_headline: ISIS Claims Deadly Attack in Jordan
